room_title: Escape room "The Art of the Steal" by Escape in 60 in Cleveland
review: We did the bank heist room. It was such a blast. I would highly recommend trying this at least once. I Am ready to take on another room. Be sure to put on your thinking cap and try to think outside of the box.

room_title: Escape room "The Art of the Steal" by Escape in 60 in Cleveland
review: We had a group of friends down last Saturday to try the Bank Heist. Awesome! Awesome! The puzzles were clever and well thought out.It felt more like being in Heat, felt like De Niro.Will be coming back to try all the room, just need some smarter friends! ;)

room_title: Escape room "The Art of the Steal" by Escape in 60 in Cleveland
review: We did the Bank Heist yesterday, we were so close but missed getting the gold out the door. We had an absolute blast! We will be coming back again to try another room. The staff was great and The Barley House across the street was an awesome place to go to before or after. It was a great day in Cleveland and my relatives from Mississippi had a great time!
